overview.heading: Sunnyvale Virtual Office
overview.body: Score big with an A-list business address in Sunnyvale, and guess what? No need to break the bank on a traditional office. Opus VO gets you that prime Sunnyvale spot without the hefty price tag. And when it’s time to impress clients or host a major pow-wow, our sleek conference rooms have got your back. Elevate your brand game with a standout Sunnyvale address.  Choosing a virtual office in Sunnyvale through Opus VO is like unlocking a VIP feature. You get your own live receptionist who’s all about delivering top-notch, tailored customer service. We make sure every client interaction is on-brand and on-point with your business goals. Hand over the grind of daily admin tasks like sorting emails and juggling calls to us, freeing you to zoom ahead with your business aspirations.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Sunnyvale, California even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Sunnyvale. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within California.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Sunnyvale virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Go Sunnyvale?
sections.body: Don’t just think of Sunnyvale as another Silicon Valley hub; it’s a thriving playground for innovation across tech, aerospace, and digital services. Our Sunnyvale locale is super strategic, giving you the easy access you need to key industry players and hot networking spots.  Opting for an Opus Virtual Office in Sunnyvale is about more than smart budgeting; it’s a game-changer that levels the playing field. Ready to fast-track your business success? Make the leap with our premium virtual office solutions today.  Opus VO Sunnyvale @ 773 E El Camino Real, Sunnyvale, CA 94087
